message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for offering! $180 seems a bit steep for me. Would you consider $120?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $160, which is a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. How about we split the difference again and settle at $140?

Alright Bob, I can see you're serious about getting a good deal! I'm willing to meet you at $155, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
